duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide first class customer service and support local market sales.
Assist in servicing customers face-to-face through familiarity and knowledge of products.
Troubleshoot customer problems and provide creative solutions.
Work closely with the Branch manager and outside sales group to develop and grow the business.
Assist team in overall maintenance of the branch.
Participate in ensuring all safety guidelines are followed.
Ensure customer service and value-add is a focal point of every interaction.
